poem:
"Bytes of Damnation"

Of dollar notes, in radical exchange,
Once bloomed the Bitcoin wunderkind:
Bankman-Fried, flushed with digital range,
In silicon confines, salvation to find.

Impudent youth of thirty-two,
Soon to fail under gavel's weight; 
Crypto-kings weep, as justice ensues, 
In chains, a grotesque fate.

Man dreams in codes and shadows dark, 
In end, finds himself alone - the mark.
